movie_title: The secrets to a healthy old age ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: How can we stay healthy in old age?  For audio and transcript downloads, plus a quiz and a list of t

vocabulary.example: The old building had decayed over time and was in need of serious renovation.

vocabulary.definition: the capacity to have an effect on the character, development, or behavior of someone or something
vocabulary.example: Her positive attitude influenced those around her to also stay optimistic in challenging times.

vocabulary.definition: the state of feeling sad and alone
vocabulary.example: Despite being surrounded by people, she couldn't shake off the feeling of loneliness.

vocabulary.definition: shared by all members of a community, for common use
vocabulary.example: The village had a communal garden where everyone could grow their own vegetables.

vocabulary.definition: existing or occurring with something else
vocabulary.example: The accompanying music added a sense of drama to the movie scene.

vocabulary.definition: having a positive outlook on situations
vocabulary.example: Despite facing setbacks, she remained optimistic about the future and believed things would turn out well.
